import React from 'react' import "./WeatherComponent.css" export const WeatherInfoIcon = { sunset : "../images/night.svg", sunrise : "../images/day.svg", wind : "../images/wind.svg", pressure : "../images/pressure.svg", temp : "../images/temp.svg", humidity : "../images/humidity.svg" } const WeatherInfoComponent = (props) =>{ const {name , value} = props; return( <>
{value} {name}
); } const WeatherComponent = (props) => { const {weather} = props; return ( <>

Weather Details

30C

{`${weather.name} , ${weather?.say?.country}`}

) } export default WeatherComponent
